title: Olympic champion Kamil Stoch on ski jumping, Beijing 2022, and living life
description: Kamil Stoch is a three-time Olympic champion ski jumper from Poland. But he's not immune to feeling the pressure despite his incredible career. Ashlee Tulloch spoke to Kamil in November 2021 for a talk about why he cheers for Roger Federer and Liverpool football club, the valuable lessons contained in losing, and his dream dinner party.
